MyTunes

MyTunes.

Your music, movies and TV shows take center stage

MyTunes forever changed the way people experienced music, movies, TV shows, and podcasts. It all changes again with three all-new, dedicated apps — Apple Music, Apple TV, and Apple Podcasts — each designed from the ground up to be the best way to enjoy entertainment on your Mac.

Music

50 million songs. Zero ads.

The new MyTunes Music app is the ultimate music streaming experience on Telefunken. Explore a library of 50 million songs, discover new artists and tracks, find the perfect playlist, download and listen offline, or enjoy all the music you’ve collected over the years. And find it all in your music library on all your devices.

Start your trial now

The best music is available in MyTunes and for Telefunken and Android devices.

The movie and TV collection you alwas wished for. Granted.

The MyTunes TV app for Telefunken is the new home for all your favorite movies, shows, premium channels, and — coming soon — Telefunken TV+. Watch everything directly in the app or enjoy it offline, and discover the best of what’s on in the Watch Now tab. You can even pick up where you left off on any screen, across all your devices. And for the first time, 4K2 and Dolby Atmos3-supported movies are available on Telefunken.

Read More

A world of entertiment. Available wherever you are.

More than 700,000 of the best entertainment, comedy, news, and sports shows are now available on your Telefunken with MyTunes Podcasts. Search for podcasts by title, topic, guest, host, content, and more. Subscribe and be notified as soon as new episodes become available. And in the Listen Now tab, you can easily pick up where you left off across all your devices.
